tshiṱuku: no malwa na kana a no ngo malwa
u ya nga hu sa gumi
ḓuvha ḽavhuḓi ḽa mabebo kha inwi
zwi a konḓa u tou ralo
ni vhe na ḓuvha ḽa vhuḓi
ri a vusa no vuwa hani
ḓuvha ḽanu ḽo vha ḽi hani

a little: I don't understand what you mean
tshiṱuku: Ndi khou pfesesa zwine na khou amba zwone
Na nṋe ndi a ni funa
Ndi khou ṱoḓa u ni vhona
ndi kale ndi sa ni vhoni

a little: many many happy returns of the day
tshiṱuku: mashudu na dziphṱhutshedzo kha ḓuvha heḽi

a little: My hovercraft is full of eels
tshiṱuku: Mukhumbi wanga wo ḓala nga khunga
ndi vha zwavhuḓi u ṱangana na inwi
luambo luthihi a lu ngo vhuya lwa lingana

a little: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.
tshiṱuku: Ndivho yashu: u ita uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe, e huṅwe na huṅwe a kone u pfesesa ḽifhasi na u ḓisumbedza nga nyambo dzoṱhe.

a little: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
tshiṱuku: Ndivho yashu: u dzudzanya mafhungo a ḽifhasi ra ita uri a kone u swikelea na u shumisea nga vhoṱhe.
ndi ḓo ni vhona hu si kale

a little: Thank you for your patience while we investigate shipment
tshiṱuku: Ro livhuwa u konḓelela havho musi ri tshi kha ḓi ita ṱhoḓisiso ya zwo rumelwaho
Ri khou livhuwa u shumisa apu yashu

a little: what are you doing right now
what do you do for a living
